attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2002-2229

Date: 2002-12-13

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 46 of the

Parliament of Canada Act, hereby appoints, for a period terminating on December 12, 2003, each of the following Members of the House of Commons to be Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister set out opposite the name of the Member:
